item.title: Did Txt
item.description: did.txt: Generate a minimalist micro journal using vim With all the distractions I’m facing in the office I sometimes find it hard to keep track of what I was doing. Some troubleshooting here, a bit of coding there, meetings, etc. Some days are just context switching from one task to the next. At the end of the day it’s still nice to turn back and track your progress and to have a reference point to start off next day.
